list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Maybe he’ll come, and maybe he won’t.

list_ex_of_english: In the end, maybe ' presence' is what it's all about, for all of us who try to write about opera.
They started to act as self-conscious actors in the local arenas and, maybe even more important, they were recognised as such by locals and non-locals.
Maybe we will want to qualify what we say about in vitro fertilization as time goes on.
Maybe parts of the dissemination problem are due to ignorance of important moral issues.
Maybe because someone accompanies them, someone who gives them security and believes in their future.
Maybe we should seek a rich axiomatization for defining the relationships that can hold between the constructs proposed in rhetorical argumentation.
Maybe classical music just died, on its own, of natural causes.
An example maybe of evolutionary over-engineering, it is reminiscent of the discredited thesis that phylogeny necessarily recapitulates ontogeny.
